footnote-md: This property should be false, since the increment of the `donors` map could overflow.
This property should always be false, since a contract can receive ETH when its address is specified in a coinbase transaction or in a `selfdestruct`.
This property is false since donors can reclaim their donations (after the donation period has ended and the goal has not been reached).
All funds may have been reclaimed already.
Receiver of the funds may revert the transaction.
